Description: A local, unique identifier for this milestone. This field is used to keep track of multiple revisions of a milestone through the compilation from release to record mechanism.
The date the milestone is due.
[Consult codelist] The status that was realized on the date provided.
The date the milestone was last reviewed or modified and the status was altered or confirmed to still be correct.
List of documents associated with this milestone. See Document section for further details.
